profile.name: Lukas Barragan Torres
profile.title: Student Master of Science in Computer Science

personalStatement.title: Personal Statement
personalStatement.content: I am a highly motivated and detail-oriented student pursuing a Master of Science in Computer Science. With a solid foundation in programming and a passion for technology, I aim to leverage my skills in software development and problem-solving to contribute to innovative projects and make a positive impact in the tech industry.

content.title: Finished High School
content.description: Graduated from high school with a focus on science and mathematics.

content.title: Lifeguard
content.description: Worked as a lifeguard in an indoor swimming pool, ensuring the safety of swimmers and providing assistance when needed.

content.title: Worked for Zero Friction
content.description: Gained practical experience in software development and project management while working on various projects.

content.title: Student member of the Computer Science Education Committee
content.description: Joined the committee with another third-year student to represent the interests and concerns of third-year Bachelor students.

content.title: Bachelor's in Informatics
content.description: Graduated cum laude with a Bachelor's degree in Informatics, passing all exams on the first attempt.

content.title: Worked for HPC UGent
content.description: Contributed to high-performance computing projects, optimizing code and managing computational tasks.

content.title: Swimming Instructor
content.description: I give swimming lessons to various age groups and skill levels, focusing on water safety and technique improvement (6 Years).

content.title: Self-Hosting Enthusiast
content.description: I maintain a personal Synology NAS and self-host various applications.

content.title: Active in Sports and Hobbies
content.description: Passionate about swimming, chess, and going to the gym.

content.title: Lifeguard Certification
content.description: Certified lifeguard with training in water safety, rescue techniques, and first aid.

content.title: Bachelor's in Informatics
content.description: Comprehensive undergraduate program focusing on various aspects of computer science and information technology.
